  • Classes in it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller used by it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller
    Class
    Description
    GameServerController
    Actual GameController server implementation which all network controllers delegate to
    LobbyControllerFactory
    Factory object which constructs a protocol-specific controller.
    LobbyServerController
    Actual LobbyController server implementation which all network controllers delegate to
    LockProtected
    Represent an object which should only be accessed through the use of a lock
    LockProtected.LockCloseable
    Closeable which will unlock the lock automatically once closed
    PlayerObservableTracker
    Allows to track observables registered by a player in order to automatically unregister them once said player disconnects
    PlayerObservableTracker.ThrowingConsumer
    Consumer which is allowed to throw disconnection related user exceptions, pushing the burden of handling them on someone else
    ServerController
